org.ardenus.state

Class LoadState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.state.GameState
      • org.ardenus.state.LoadState

  • public abstract class LoadState
extends GameState
    This state is entered when the game has a lot of tasks it needs to complete before it can enter the next state. This can consist of many things, however it normally has to do with loading resources that the state needs in order to function properly. Other classes can extend this state in order to make their own loading screens.

    Note: When entering a LoadState, the first argument must be the ID or the actual instance of the state that is being loaded. All arguments after that will be sent to the onEnterState() method of the state once loading is finished.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin
